Folder.label: VERILOG Component Instantiation
Folder.Template:
// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
blk_mem_gen_v2_7 YourInstanceName ( .clka(clka), .dina(dina), // Bus [15 : 0] .addra(addra), // Bus [15 : 0] .ena(ena), .wea(wea), // Bus [0 : 0] .douta(douta), // Bus [15 : 0] .clkb(clkb), .dinb(dinb), // Bus [15 : 0] .addrb(addrb), // Bus [15 : 0] .enb(enb), .web(web), // Bus [0 : 0] .doutb(doutb)); // Bus [15 : 0]
